thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Shengda Bio-Pharm says controlling shareholder proposes 2017 dividend payment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Shengda Bio-Pharm says controlling shareholder proposes 2017 dividend payment

organizations.name: reuters) - zhejiang shengda bio-pharm co ltd

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Shengda Bio-Pharm Co Ltd
* Says its controlling shareholder proposed to pay a cash dividend of 2.5 yuan (pre-tax) for every 10 shares, and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 4 new shares for every 10 shares, as the dividend payment plan for 2017
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/rmxuNz
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
